content: I'm part of a community theater production of Grease and we're just a week away from opening night. I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with last-minute prep, can you help me organize my tasks and maybe offer some tips on how to manage my time effectively? By the way, we've had a bit of a rollercoaster ride - about 4 weeks ago, our original Danny, Jack, dropped out and we had to find a replacement, but it's all worked out so far.
